name: Battle Ball (itch) (PantheraOnline)
description:
EARLY DEMO

Play against your friends in game modes based on fun sports such as soccer and dodgeball (more planed for the future).

Currently supports 1v1 play locally. (For online play check out remote game streaming services such as Parsec or others. A Steam launch is planned for the full version which will allow for use of Steam's remote play.)

Partial controller support (menus do not support controllers. Use mouse.)

No sound as of now.

This is a rough demo for feedback and to demonstrate the concept. Please leave any feedback or suggestions you may have about anything.
